items.headline: Credit-card stocks are sliding, but Trump’s plan for a 10% rate cap isn’t a done deal
items.summary_en: A 10% cap on interest rates could mean a big hit to earnings at companies like Capital One and Synchrony. But a Jefferies analyst says it’s “highly unlikely” that Trump gets his way.
